Description:
Operates as the point of contact for assigned clients/accounts and Develops and maintains long-term relationships with clients.
Maintains a delicate balance between client and company goals while focusing on client accounts to form budding client relationships.
Responsible for overseeing accounts of several clients while carrying out client and company goals ensuring they do not overlap or interfere with each other.
Convey the end goals, contractual and non-contractual obligations, and other facets of a client's business with the internal team to speak on behalf of the client and look out for their interests.Skills
Skills:
Demonstrated ability to manage several project.
Proficiency in directing multiple undertakings.
Effortless supervision skills to handle numerous projects.
An all-encompassing skill to supervise and perform several activities at the same time.
Min 2 years experience in HORECA sector.
